channel.title: Server writing help plz
channel.description:
hi moparisthebest told me to ask this here so ya um how do i write my own server [(317) or (474)] i have been using moparscape 3.2 then i asked moparisthebest how to make npc's talk in the 3.2 he said you cain't and i need to wright my own plz help
im 13 and have a bit of experince modeling but not much else
